pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium 4 / 2.0GHz
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 9.0c compatible card, 128MB of VRAM
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:5GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible card
